dcterms:description: Earth System Data Cubes (ESDCs) provide an organized spatiotemporal framework for simplified multitemporal analyses, enhancing the utility of Sentinel-2 surface reflectance data.
dcterms:title: Earth System Data Cubes (ESDCs)

dcterms:creator: D. P. Roy
J. Ju
P. Lewis
C. Schaaf
F. Gao
M. Hansen
E. Lindquist
dcterms:description: The MODIS BRDF model provides spectral parameters for computing directional reflectance across specified sensor viewing and solar angles, facilitating the adjustment of Landsat and Sentinel-2 surface reflectance data.
dcterms:title: MODIS BRDF model

dcterms:creator: G. Sumbul
M. Charfuelan
B. Demir
V. Markl
dcterms:description: BigEarthNet is a large-scale benchmark archive for remote sensing image understanding, derived from Sentinel-2 patches aimed at land cover classification benchmarks.
dcterms:title: BigEarthNet

dcterms:description: Sentinel-2 L2A data provides high-to-medium resolution surface reflectance data essential for Earth surface analysis, captured by the MultiSpectral Instrument (MSI).
dcterms:title: Sentinel-2 L2A data

dcterms:creator: S. Walther

dcterms:description: FluxnetEO is a dataset that provides a view from space on global flux towers using MODIS and Landsat data, facilitating vegetation monitoring.
dcterms:title: FluxnetEO
